website_summaries.verdict: Easy and quick folding step for RVs and other uses. Covered in a safety grip surface and built from sturdy steel with a rustproof powder coating.
pros: Powder coated steel build that is solid and highly durable
Rubber foot grips hold safely in place
Lockable legs add extra stability with a weight capacity of 300 pounds
Two height settings of 3.5 inches and 7.5 inches
cons: Some users find it too bulky to store away conveniently

customer_reviews.title: 5 star for structure but failed on cosmetic part
customer_reviews.text: I would love to give this a 5 star. The structure is well built and exactly what I needed for some of our buses but being in Las Vegas this product get tested to the extreme here. With summer temp on average 113F degrees and the anti-slip that's glued on top of the platform did not last especially when left inside the bus and temp shoots up 145F inside. The glue eventually melted off and lost its grip power so I improvised, removed the original anti-slip and installed 3M version from Home Depot. I also bolted the rubber pad on foot stand so it wont come off(lost one of 'em already)
customer_reviews.author: Brendo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for big guys
customer_reviews.text: This step is freakin awesome. I'm a big boy (330lb 6'4") and I need something to help me step out of my RV. I bought this one because of the weight capacity. It just looks and feel super solid. The legs fold completely under the the platform so it's easy to stow away. Also, it's big enough that you don't have to worry about missing the step. This is one of the best items I've bought for my RV since owning it.
customer_reviews.author: darqman

customer_reviews.title: Less expensive and better quality and bigger platform than any of the others I looked at
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! I bought it to make the step up into my camper less of a hassle and it works perfect! I used to have to put one foot up and then use the hand rail to pull myself up and in, but now I can just step right in! It has a big platform, bigger than most on the market and my dog took right to it and uses it with ease to get into the camper too! This one was less expensive and better quality than any of the others I looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Spenda Buck

customer_reviews.title: Very nice as a "first step"
customer_reviews.text: Very nice as a "first step". We have a 3-step camper and even with that, that first step from the ground can be a big 'un. This product is sturdy when legs are extended. As its only drawback, when the legs are folded up for a shorter step, do not get too close to the edge. The product will tilt and may cause an ankle injury. We've used it several times so far this season and on at least 2 trips, I've come close to rolling my ankle because of this. Just pay attention to were you're stepping and you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Saucier

customer_reviews.title: I think this is a great product and worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I have an RV an occasionally need the extra step. I think this is a great product and worth the money. Very sturdy except when you drive your car over it because you didn't see it .... like me lol. I'm ordering a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Chipitolina

customer_reviews.title: For our 13 yo black lab to stick her head out of the window of the truck
customer_reviews.text: Bought for our 13 yo black lab, she needs a bit of a boost to get in truck and my SUV. Wasn't sure from photos if this would work. When she's having a good day she can step on running board into cab, no problem. Other days we've been using her folding dock ramp trifold. We put in ground folded, it's 7" high and 15" wide. It works but it's huge and very heavy. This step is perfection. SUPER sturdy. Low to ground so it's easy for her to step on it. Really deep step so she's comfortable using. And the top is full no slip adhesive. I am impressed. Ordering another for my SUV and one for our bed.
customer_reviews.author: Melody

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very solid and well built. Good surface for traction and appears to be a good finish on the metal. The legs don't lock completely, that I see, and the rubber pads on the feet are subject to sliding off (and being lost?). But it's a good heavy weight for stability. My husband was doubtful, but has given it his unqualified blessing. That's big! Very glad I bought it because it solved a big problem.
customer_reviews.author: NCS

customer_reviews.title: SOLID BUILT METAL PLATFORM, LARGE ENOUGH TO STEP ON WITH BOTH FEET AND TURN AROUND EASILY
customer_reviews.text: solid step for the bedside for my elderly husband to step on to get into our bed that is raised due to rails on the frame. has a non-skid top. he can step up on it with both feet, turn around and then sit on our king size bed with no problem. really helped to get him in bed.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce Howland

customer_reviews.title: Perfect if your RV's last step is a doozy
customer_reviews.text: You can see in the photo that my RV's last step is a doozy. I've used everything from cement blocks to plastic footstools to solve the problem. But now I full-time in my RV and so I need a better solution. This product stays put in high winds and it folds for transport. You can't see it well in the photo but the gravel ledge is scalloped under the step -- which is why I bought it. The legs settled in to provide stability, unlike boards or concrete blocks that wobble.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Rosenberger

customer_reviews.title: Helped an ailing relative get into their bed easier
customer_reviews.text: Our 91 year old family member was having a great deal of difficulty getting up and out of bed after a recent surgery and we needed a step tool to help them. This JQ-S150 Platform Step can up after some searching and this was exactly what we needed. The non-slip,2' long platform (with a depth of nearly 16") was perfect for them as their footing was not as precise as it had been before the surgery. As they recovered, we folded the legs under and the platform help them easy into the bed in a more normal way. What a great product!
customer_reviews.author: George K.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Excellent step! I actually got this to clamp very heavy duty art tracing protector onto the side. The projector has a very tall arm, so that the projector extends overhead, over my desk. It was the perfect solution! The tilted legs on the step, ensure that it doesnt tip over, because the projector and arm are very heavy, clapped to one side. But aside from my use as a projector stand, it also is wonderful as a step! Very solid, sturdy, large space to stand on, and has a wonderful non-skid surface top.
customer_reviews.author: Starfish

customer_reviews.title: A well-built, solid, large platform step
customer_reviews.text: It's a well-built, solid platform step. However, it was too big and heavy for our needs. We needed a safety step for elderly relatives to get in and out of our minivan. The platform worked well, but it was so big and heavy that it wasn't practical. There wasn't a convenient place to put the step when not in use. Went with an 11" X 14" platform step which fit perfectly alongside the middle row seat.
customer_reviews.author: Mini Driver

customer_reviews.title: Very bad design. It is built of sturdy materials but ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has dementia and unsteady balance. Bought it to help him into bed. Two legs collapsed and I had to call paramedics to get him off the floor. Used to be a contractor and if I had a step that dumped an employee it would have been costly. There is a pin and a hole it could be pushed into lock the step but the pin isn't movable. Very bad design. It is built of sturdy materials but if you can not stand on it safely it is a liability. Had my husband been hurt I would be suing. This product should be off the market and manufactures libel for damages.
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is the best money I have spent. I have used this step both long ways when we just need an extra step and short ways when we were camping in a park that had a huge drop off and our steps would not reach to the ground. We had to use our leveling pads on our steps which made them really high. I placed this step where the short end was between our permanent steps and this was wonderful. We and the dogs were able to get in and out of the Rig with ease. Don't hesitate to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: Karen D.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way
customer_reviews.text: One word. PERFECT! Seriously, look no further. This is the step to purchase. Our travel trailer step was too high and not wide enough for our big feet. With this step, we can safely get in and out of the trailer, as can our pups. In fact, o e pup loves to sleep on this step while lounging around camp. It is pretty heavy but that is what makes it work so well.
customer_reviews.author: Outinthecountry

customer_reviews.title: Works well to load dogs in SUV
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to assist my dogs for climbing into my Toyota Highlander. It’s a little bulky but compared to most products marketed for dogs to get into cars, not bulky at all. It folds and fits into my back seat. It’s a little heavy for the task. But positioned long ways/vertical my dogs can put all 4 feet on it at the same time. I wish it were 2 inches taller. Overall happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MYTMITE

customer_reviews.title: Nice and stable!
customer_reviews.text: The step was purchased to make it easier for my dog to get in and out of the trailer when we are camping. Very sturdy and Stella did not hesitate for a second once it was set down in front of the door. I confess I also like it as it is much wider and deeper than the fold down step that came with the trailer. Nice solid feel. I saw a review or two where people thought it was heavy but I do not think it is bad at all and think that is what gives it such a sturdy feel.
customer_reviews.author: BMac

customer_reviews.title: Good step stool
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this step stool to put at the door of our van camper. It is very sturdy and seems to be made out of good material. I would have given it 5 Stars except for the rubber covers over the bottom of each leg. They slide off easily and we have to keep putting them back on. Instead of sending the product back, we are going to figure out a way to glue them on.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie L.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, large platform and folds away easily
customer_reviews.text: Needed a sturdy step to load things in and out of my horse trailer without getting in the way when I don't need it. This product works great for that. I'm 240 pounds plus whatever I'm moving, it doesn't seem to phase this step at all. Also, I like that it has a large area to step on so I'm not searching for the step with arms full of things.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Thooft

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our RV
customer_reviews.text: We originally bought a smaller, plastic one that holds 300 lbs, but at 230 lbs it felt unstable to me and was about 1⁄2 the size of our RV steps. This one nearly matches the size of our RV septs, has a better non slip cover and is VERY sturdy. Sure it will take more room in our storage compartments and it is heavy as heck. Small prices to pay for its size and stability.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Walker

customer_reviews.title: This platform step is a very well made product.
customer_reviews.text: The quick products step platform has been extremely helpful in our entering our camper as the bottom step on the camper is rather high. The platform has served us very well. We've used it continuously on every trip since we purchased it in 2016. I just wish I had glued the rubber pads to the legs as I have lost a couple over the years. I will do so in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Large Step with one small problem
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help my wife get into our van. Very large platform with a very non skid service. Excellent stability and really works well. Just one little problem. Rubber feet are slipped on to the metal legs and they don't stay attached. Had to return the first one because the two of the rubber feet were missing. The replacement unit came with all four rubber feet which I glued in place with some epoxy adhesive.
customer_reviews.author: WFD

customer_reviews.title: BIG, HEAVY DUTY, STABLE
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what we were looking for, large, heavy duty, and very stable for the first step into the garage of our big 5th wheel RV. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: artillerybuff

customer_reviews.title: Very stable but a bit overpriced for the overall quality.
customer_reviews.text: These are very stable steps and hold up well under heavy use. I just wish the top piece was more than a thin sticker that peels up within a week of use. I used spray adhesive to hold ours down but at this price the top non slip paper could be made far better.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia S Henry

customer_reviews.title: Durable, large, and great price!
customer_reviews.text: Great size and height! There are always those times when camping that your steps end up to high. I often take my Grandmother on trips with me, I have small children, and Im pregnant so that height can be to much! This step is sturdy, large, and durable. It feels secure and the height works out great plus it has a great price. I only ordered one to make sure we liked it but will probably be ordering another for the other door before long
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Helps my dog jump into my truck.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a step for my dog to use to jump into the back seat of my truck. I like how Wide and stable it is. After a little trial period she now uses it regularly with ease. The rough tread gives her good traction. It folds up easily.
customer_reviews.author: Rock Man

customer_reviews.title: junk don't waste your cash
customer_reviews.text: This has already broken in the short time we have had it. First the rubber feet would not stay on and now it caved in the center...junk don't waste your cash...and like always its no longer able to be returned gotta love it!
customer_reviews.author: The Wood's

customer_reviews.title: Step up to quality!
customer_reviews.text: Saw one of these in an RV campground and thought it might be useful for when our steps are too high. Wow - my husband could believe the quality for the price. Heavy, sturdy, easy to use, and two positions. Nice size gives us room to step down safely and securely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but rubber feet constantly fall off
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy entry step that we use at the base of the stairs on our motor-home. It's the perfect height and width, and is very sturdy. My only complaint is that the rubber feet constantly slip off and won't stay in place. I've considered using some Gorilla-glue to secure them, and will probably do so in the future, but this is a design flaw that should be addressed.
customer_reviews.author: Space Coast

customer_reviews.title: Strong, secure and safe
customer_reviews.text: This step works perfectly for our RV. After measuring carefully, this one had the right height that we needed. It is quite heavy and therefore, strong and stable. It folds easily for storage. The top has a nice non slip surface which is another safety feature. Our's had a little issue. The customer service department is fantastic!!! Rest assured that they want you to be completely happy with their product.! Can't go wrong with this!
customer_reviews.author: traveling girl

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and reliable
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have purchased one of these. I originally bought it as s base for s portable air conditioner, but found it worked well as a platform for my wine refrigerator to raise it off the radiant heated floor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Getting just one sturdy step up is all you need sometimes to make all the difference.
customer_reviews.text: I thought that my wife was silly for buying this platform step but she uses it to get in and out of bed and it's helping her a lot. And the thing is sturdy. So she got what she was looking for and also now when we might need just a few more inches to change a light bulb or whatnot this will easily be used in place of a shaky and less stabile step stool.
customer_reviews.author: THowerton

customer_reviews.title: QUALITY - SAFETY - LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to your RV. Well built. We have used it with the legs folded and extended. Works great both ways for those times when you are not parked n level ground. Wish we bought one sooner.
customer_reviews.author: The Value King

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy step!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made step but the rubber feet protectors do come off. One of our floated away in a thunderstorm. I contacted the company on their website and they immediately sent 4 replacement feet!! I will glue these on! Would highly recommend this step and this company. Great customer service!
customer_reviews.author: GolfingDebby

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Built like a tank, very sturdy, but I'm like the other reviewers I don't understand the leg pins. Still waiting for answer about mystery pins. Dropped a star because they never answered my question.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: A bit low and weighs more than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Big platform, roomy for sitting, TOO HEAVY for comfortable everyday use. Bought as step into conversion van. Just a bit too low and certainly too heavy to cart around and store. Be certain of what your plan is for this. (Some who sit, might need a hand getting up.)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: As advertised; wish it were a tad taller
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Love the wide, large step surface. I wish it were 2 inches taller. We use it as a step to get in and out of the horse trailer tack room. However, it is very well made, very stable and is better than nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for work so that technicians can better access the machines that we are working with. My only complaint is that the rubber feet keep sliding off. I put double sided tape between the rubber foot and the metal foot, but that only helped temporarily.
customer_reviews.author: radioguy

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the money!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy step. I am 290 lbs and this held my weight easy. Solid and easy to fold. Heavy duty. We got a 2nd one after we used this one for a few weeks. I would recommend this to anyone. Better quality and priced than the camping stores and other places on line.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Crooks

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty oversize RV step platform.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a much larger and nicer entry step into my RV Rather than dropping down into a big puddle and so far I’ve been very happy with it. My wife at 5‘3“ finds it much nicer to get in and out of the RV. Heavy but won’t blow away!
customer_reviews.author: Maury

customer_reviews.title: Great stool with one flaw
customer_reviews.text: This would receive a 5 star on all areas except the rubber leg covers come off. If you don’t know it the stool is not sturdy. Too late to return it when it started happening.
customer_reviews.author: Dexter’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and reliable
customer_reviews.text: We use this step for our Rv while we are traveling. Love it. A bit heavy but sturdy. The only thing is that the rubber covers on the feet fall off easily and we have already lost one.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Wedegis

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Helps Senior Dogs Into Vehicles With No Slipping!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding quality at a great price. Bought to assist senior XL dog into vehicle. Works great. Love the traction for him. Thank you so much with having a product that works much better than slick, unsafe dog ramps.
customer_reviews.author: WS MOM

customer_reviews.title: Great for Any SUV
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I use this for my mom who just had a hip replacement surgery. B4 her surgery, we tried it 2 ways. Legs up & then down. Legs up is for higher car or trucks. It was too high for our SUV. Legs folded down is perfect for my SUV, Mom had no problems getting in!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Corvino

customer_reviews.title: It’s heavy
customer_reviews.text: One of the leg was wobbly, the rubber on the one of stand fell off can’t find it, it’s heavy item but what I like is that it’s has a big on top, I was gonna returned but husband said he could use it in our shed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Durable and stable.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our RV. We liked the stability of this step. It is wider than others we looked at and heavier. The others we looked at would shift if you did not step perfectly in the center. Love this one!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Heavy and the legs don't lock securely, also the rubber feet do not stay on, could be better.used now for a mounth, the non silp surface on top is coming off, the edge cut into your hands and the legs have to be watched that they are locked. Very poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas F.

customer_reviews.title: QP Extra-Large Platform Step is Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: This step is a perfect size for an RV entry (and exit) platform. It is much safer than stepping from a narrow bottom step. It also helps the dog to feel more comfortable about going up and down the steps.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived within one day! Excellent quality. Yes it is heavier than a plastic step, but VERY stable. I will order another for my front RV steps.
customer_reviews.author: watkins23xl

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfect
customer_reviews.text: Big enough and wide enough to help children and elderly enter and exit my 23 foot hybrid camper. It's actually great for myself and my wife. Wish I bought this earlier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Bloody love this step
customer_reviews.text: The first thing you notice is its wide. This makes it sturdy and gives it a substantial feel- no worries about balance. I thought it might be a touch short but no, the height is spot on, Highly recomend
customer_reviews.author: offog

customer_reviews.title: Good buy for correct application
customer_reviews.text: I had to send back was little to high for my use and heavy. But like for trailer or rv step this unit will out last the RV.
customer_reviews.author: Peter U.

customer_reviews.title: Bargain for the price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we wanted. Very stable and large. The only negative thing, and wouldn’t keep me from buying again, is the rubber pads on the bottom of each leg slips off easily
customer_reviews.author: jessie elaine haddox

customer_reviews.title: Stool
customer_reviews.text: This product is really good nice format very sturdy and stay in place were you put it unles you move it before standing on it.
customer_reviews.author: alvarez

customer_reviews.title: Solid but issues
customer_reviews.text: It came with some dents in the edges. The non skid has peeled up all around the edge during our first use (rainy). Rubber feet do slide off. It is a nice large platform so will keep it and use other non skid products.
customer_reviews.author: JMP

customer_reviews.title: the first step can be pretty high. This step is solid and it does ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because our trailer is raised and depending on where we camp, the first step can be pretty high. This step is solid and it does not wobble or feel flimsy! It weighs enough to stay in place and it's large enough for the biggest feet!! It is not adjustable, but it is tall enough that we have not needed one that adjusts! I'm really glad I purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: Shanna

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, this is the sturdiest and largest collapsible platform I’ve found. It’s constantly being folded up and down to assist my dogs getting into the SUV and it withstands their weight without moving.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and wide
customer_reviews.text: What I love about this step is that it is nice and wide. I don't have to worry about missing it when exiting my vintage trailer
customer_reviews.author: Tess M.

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: This step is sturdy and well worth purchasing! I bought it to use with my pop-up trailer when camping, but found another everyday use. My 14 year old dog suffers from arthritis and had trouble getting on the sofa, with this step she can still have some comfort in life.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: This is GREAT!!
customer_reviews.text: This is GREAT!!! Using it as a inital step up into RV. Perfect size, durable, non-slip and very stable! Fits under RV when at home in drive way and easy store under the RV in storage bay. Legs fold easy and flat. GREAT BUY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: perfect for that extra step on your rv
customer_reviews.text: very sturdy, great stepping area, larger than the steps to our rv....a great purchase and i would recommend
customer_reviews.author: blacklisted

customer_reviews.title: Works great as a PC stand.
customer_reviews.text: I have one the largest PC cases available and i wanted it off my desk but not on the floor. This step works perfect for the job.
customer_reviews.author: Tootsie Nootan

customer_reviews.title: The rubber feet are loosely attached and easily slide off
customer_reviews.text: The rubber feet are loosely attached and easily slide off!!!! I bought this so my wife could get into my truck. After using it two times three of the cheap rubber feet were lost!!!! They just slip, and there is NO GRIPPING action to hold them. AVOID this product.
customer_reviews.author: Radioconnection

customer_reviews.title: works great
customer_reviews.text: love this item....makes getting into camper so much easier for grandma grandpa and those little grands
customer_reviews.author: JOANNE YANCEY

customer_reviews.title: This step works great! We've got a toy hauler
customer_reviews.text: This step works great! We've got a toy hauler, and the axles have been flipped for off-road use, so the lowest step is up there. We've used milk crates and other shaky methods to reach that first step, but this platform step takes the cake. It's sturdy, folds up (a little bit), and the non skid surface seems to be adhering well. This gets 2 thumbs up from me and my wife.
customer_reviews.author: SoCalGlide

customer_reviews.title: Good step for the price
customer_reviews.text: Like the step. Nice big step for the dogs to hit as well as ourselves. Cheap anti slip material on step that is not glued very well and has torn . A little spray glue should help. I would pay a little more if we need to use the step all of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is definitely sturdy and useful. My only complaint is their are rubber pads on the bottom that easily slip off. I like the pads because the edges are a bit sharp and could damage the outdoor rug.
customer_reviews.author: Bluegrass Mama

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product and it was very well made. However I had to return it as it did not fulfill my need
customer_reviews.author: ziggy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: This step works really well. I am a short person and this really helps me on that first step into the RV.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda H. Grubb

customer_reviews.title: great first step
customer_reviews.text: my RV step is just to high even for a tall person like me. I had a few complaints from relatives to "watch that last step". this was an economical solution that has worked out well. it is a little heavy but then it is steel. there were other options in aluminum but the price factor resolved that issue for me. I will suffer the weight difference through my wallet.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Booster Step For My Dog
customer_reviews.text: I use this product as a booster step for my 115 pound Akita. He is getting a bit older and this step helps him up into and out of both the bathing tub and the grooming table. It is EXTREMELY stable, non slip and sturdy. Absolutely no hesitation on the part of my dog stepping up and down on it. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Designing Woman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Got this to help my old dog in and out of car. She would not use the smaller steps and sits in the back seat so a ramp did not work. She did not like it at first, but once I put a thin rug on it (with duct tape), she was fine. It is the perfect height and size, but a bit heavy to move around. Small price to pay though....
customer_reviews.author: Fosdog

customer_reviews.title: Great Heavy Duty RV Step.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item, especially when our travel trailer has to be raied to level it on the entry side. It is very heavy duty with a non slip coating. You have to watch the rubber feet as they come off easily. I am going to glue them on.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: great RV step
customer_reviews.text: Perfect , as you can fold the legs up for small step or legs out for a higher step
customer_reviews.author: Marie C.

customer_reviews.title: Effective
customer_reviews.text: Very nice additional step when our jacks lift the front to level our Motorhome
customer_reviews.author: sgyrag

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and strong
customer_reviews.text: Really impressed.. heavy duty,sturdy,wide,and great no slip texture on top. No wobble
customer_reviews.author: MLD

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: This step stool is very substantial in weight and quality and is exactly what I wanted. I am very pleased
customer_reviews.author: SherriHW

customer_reviews.title: Stout step
customer_reviews.text: It is very sturdy. Quite heavy. A little awkward to store, it's pretty big.
customer_reviews.author: Saundra Strasser

customer_reviews.title: Large and sturdy step
customer_reviews.text: Sad that it had 3 small dents on the top edges. The box wasn’t damaged, so the step was packed that way initially, poor quality control. We needed it right away so we didn’t return it, and it didn’t lessen the fact that it’s a great step. The pads did come off on that first trip, I’ve gorilla glued them back on, so hopefully that’s taken care of.
customer_reviews.author: Winks

customer_reviews.title: Quality could be better.
customer_reviews.text: A good and sturdy platform. My unit came with one loose leg, which was easy to fix, but the bottom side of each corner is sharp and should have been fillet welded but can be fixed also. I also had to cut the non skid pad to relieve the air bubbles. I really like the collapsible leg function allowing for different levels of adjustment.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Carichoff

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic, but we did have to reorder
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, but we did have to reorder, one of the pads on the leg was missing, was taken care ASAP. But we did have to glue down the pads, works better than I thought it would, very wide & sturdy, just fold it up & put it on the rug inside of camper door. Our furry babies like the steps so much more & so do we. U have a sturdy step & even sit on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works flat or with legs folded out.
customer_reviews.text: WOW! This step is well built and rock solid. Non slip surface is just the thing on rainy days for stable entry into the coach. For safety sake this is a must purchase. My only question is, 'why did I wait so long to.'
customer_reviews.author: Bill Duke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for helping my elderly Mom into our high off ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for helping my elderly Mom into our high off the ground vehicle. Step is a comfortable height & large enough surface for her to comfortably turn around on. Very sturdy and stable. I little heavy but worth it for the stability and surface size.
customer_reviews.author: smart shopper

customer_reviews.title: Strong,sturdy,stable
customer_reviews.text: Bought to help my mastiff load into car after surgery. It’s excellent. Exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: B. Delisi

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy. Easy to fold up the legs and store
customer_reviews.text: We use it outside our camper as an additional step. Sturdy. Easy to fold up the legs and store. Only minus is the neoprene pads on the feet slide off easily. We've already lost one. Still, a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid foot stool!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice foot stool/step, but the rubber foot pads keep coming off. Not a big deal, as I can always get some kind of adhesive to keep them in place.
customer_reviews.author: Newporter 949

customer_reviews.title: Great step up
customer_reviews.text: Solid, perfect fit next to bed. Wide and very sturdy so no wobbling, no bending.
customer_reviews.author: Wallis

customer_reviews.title: Super heavy duty step
customer_reviews.text: Super heavy duty step..the reviews were true...if you're a big guy like me, 295lb Then this steps for u. Only thiing is its heavy, but for my rv its great. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Alward

customer_reviews.title: Well built.
customer_reviews.text: Solid all around. 300lb capacity and works great for a Bottom step when your stairs don’t reach the ground. Other uses as well.
customer_reviews.author: Customer 1964

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Very Easy to set up. Pretty accurate tire pressure readings. Can turn off when not using.
customer_reviews.author: EdP

customer_reviews.title: works so good with our RV
customer_reviews.text: works so good with our RV. our dog has arthritis and this makes it so much easier for her to get up and down the RV stairs.... the extra step she needed.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Strong and stable
customer_reviews.text: Perfect alternative to our small camper step. Heavy duty but not too heavy to carry. Very stable and the same height as the camper's single step
customer_reviews.author: Gregthetenor

customer_reviews.title: Great Step
customer_reviews.text: This step is reasonably priced, sturdy and convenient to use and store with a large step surface.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Moran

customer_reviews.title: Study ad a rock and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 255 and these are sturdy add a rock when I step on. Love the easy fold down legs for minimal storage area needed.
customer_reviews.author: azane

customer_reviews.title: Sure footed!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a step I could trust when I step down from my camper, especially at night. This was more than expected in terms of sturdiness and being very surefooted!
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Great adding that extra step for your RV
customer_reviews.text: My balance is off and this steps helps steady me when I have to go in and out my RV. It’s heavy but guess that is why it works well-Doesn’t tip over when using it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: Pass
customer_reviews.text: I love this step it is perfect for our camper BUT I am a big guy 6-6 400 pounds so I bought a step that said it held up to a Thousand pounds It has already bent on our first trip out and it was not abused
customer_reviews.author: Brian W.

customer_reviews.title: Get this step.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this step for our motor home. Wanted something to add to the pre-existing stairs which would make it easier to get in and out of the motor home. This is just perfect! Very well constructed and sturdy. Easy to set up and take down. Easy to store. If you have a motor home or travel trailer this step is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie

customer_reviews.title: Damaged goods
customer_reviews.text: This came damaged. The box was new and didn't show any damage on the outside. One of the feet was bent and I had to get a huge, heavy rock to whack it back into place. The whole leg and foot are all messed up.
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Safer
customer_reviews.text: New to the RV community & at the suggestion of an individual the step was purchased & makes the entrance & exit from our RV much easier & safer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Quick Products JQ-S150 Platform Step, X-Large - Steel, Black
product_meta.description: Step up in comfort with the Quick Step Platform Step. This stable platform step features solid, powder coated steel construction. Its extra-large platform is perfect for RVs, offering a 7.5" or 3.5" lift. 300 lb. capacity. Locking safety legs offer a stable, secure step. Full gripper surface for traction and safety even in wet or muddy conditions. 14.4 lbs.

specifications.Cover Included: Quick Products JQ-S150 Platform Step, X-Large - Steel
